name: attempt to invoke directory as a script:
reason: A client tried to invoke a directory as a script, which isn't allowed.

name: Got error 'Primary script unknown'
reason: A client tried to run an unknown script.

name: Error dispatching request to : (polling)
reason: It seems that the server is having a hard time dispatching requests to the PHP-FPM process. This can be caused by a number of things, including a lack of resources on the server, or a misconfiguration of PHP-FPM.

name: reached max_children setting
reason: PHP ran out of child proccesses, and can't handle any more requests. The number of child proccesses will need to be raised
